item.description:
The movie is at 4:45 so lets plan on meeting around 4:15 since it is opening weekend
We can actuallly meet for appetizers earlier please let me know if anyone is interested



We have so many members hope to see you there
item.how_to_find_us: will be at small tables by snack bar
